snippet.title: Super Mario Nightfall - Trailer [NHD Holiday Direct]
snippet.description:
Super Mario Nightfall is a mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii that includes the following:
- 30+ levels with night-to-daytime theming throughout them!
- Tons of new tilesets!
- A new soundtrack!
- New backgrounds!
- Enemy retextures!
And more!

— DESCRIPTION —
happy holidays!! once again, a TON has changed since the last trailer (which is over a year old now, jeez). this project has gotten so ambitious that almost EVERYTHING was revamped or changed completely

thank you NHD staff for having this trailer in the NHD Holiday Direct. go check it out: https://youtu.be/_HxUehtI5x4?si=UQwut-ifcw-SZ6yx

thank you Rueven 2005 for inspiring me to make this trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HPx6bqBrE4g

trailer music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9UC1uotX1Y8

join the discord: https://discord.com/invite/BAtFdGV
